puzzle.hint: Try turning all of the pictures on the right into verbs, e.g. mouth -> mouthed

You're looking to match each bolded, italicized, and underlined word (or phrase) with one of the body parts, animal, or piece of clothing respectively, i.e. all body parts have a definition which means one of the bolded words.
Body Part Match Answers: help me / back, following him / tail, pay / foot, gun / arm, silently / mouth, wasn't well received / bust, leader / head
Animal Match Answers: punched / slug, went into / duck, close / seal, countered / buck, having to / bear, item complete / tick, love / fawn
Clothing Match Answers: toss out / boot, lost him / slip, merger / tie, punch / sock, grovel / bow, sang / belt, saw / watch
